content: निर्धू {c5c} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To shake or throw off, remove, dispel, expel, destroy; निर्धूतोऽधरशोणिमा <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; ज्ञाननिर्धूतकल्मषाः <ls>Bg. 5. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 57.</ls> {@--2@} To spurn, treat with contempt, disregard. {@--3@} To abandon, forsake, throw away. {@--4@} To repudiate, disown, reject. {@--5@} To afflict, torment, distress. {@--6@} To move about, brandish.
